评论详情: Stretch cotton that fits reel well

A bit tight and clings to my torso, but it's definitely comfortable.  The quality is nice, though the material is a bit thin. The design on the shirt is pretty, the colors are really nice. I'd say it's worth the money.
The picture looks like it’s made out of cotton when it’s not. The design looks blurry just not good

评论概述: terrible material, looks like the design was poorly printed
评论详情: Don't buy. this shirt looks nothing like the picture. Its like a bad photo off a computer that was then superimposed on a polyester top.

I wish I read the reviews before I wasted my money. The shirt in the pictures provided made the shirt appear to be made out of cotton and with the design printed on. The shirt that came in is 100% polyester (which I will admit is stated in the product information) and the design isn’t even on the same side as shown in the photos!! Would not recommend buying.
The shirt is cheap.  It looks nothing like the photos and is sized wrong.

Unfortunately this shirt was not for me . The material is not really tshirt material . It’s that silky feeling that slides around and unfortunately for me it was really itchy. The print on it was kind of blurry as well . The color is nice though. The fit runs a bit small
